duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform nuclear medicine procedures and imaging tests on patients.
Ensure patient safety during the administration of radioactive pharmaceuticals.
Operate and maintain medical imaging equipment to obtain high-quality images.
Assist in the diagnosis and treatment of various medical conditions using nuclear medicine technology.
Maintain accurate records of procedures, patient information, and radioactive materials.
Communicate with patients to explain procedures, address concerns, and provide support.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Nuclear Medicine Technology or related field
